First I played the free version. I thought the game was fun but I was getting matched with lots of cheaters and losing. So I paid $15 for the "Prime" version. I still kept getting matched with players who were either cheating or way better than me. This game is fun when you're winning. It's fun when you're losing a match that feels fair. But a lot of times the matches don't feel fair. And that makes it a lot less fun. I will continue playing since I don't have many computer games anymore. But I won't recommend it to friends.
Ah hell nah, this is the shittiest free to play fps game out there. You're better off never even seeing this game on the free section. Valve GET A BETTER VAC SYSTEM
